texts.name: Alexia
texts.biography: Serving as a noble girl, Alexia never mentions about her family and old story. She is only known as a fighter. When other noble girls are learning etiquettes at home, she has already standed on the battlefield with armor. Maybe she pursues a better life, with battle and adventure.

specialty.description: Increases kingdom's income by 350 gold per day.
specialty.name: +350 Gold
